fields.jumbo_area: [{"type": "jumbo_cards", "value": {"cards": [{"type": "item", "value": {"cardicon": 8, "headline": "Plagiarism-free guarantee", "description": "Our essay writers always work hard to guarantee 100% original and unique texts."}, "id": "4de796e5-5582-4908-83a0-27f346933640"}, {"type": "item", "value": {"cardicon": 7, "headline": "World-class Writers", "description": "Leverage world-class talented writers who have been selected from specific fields."}, "id": "f7eace1c-3bd7-4e79-a16c-9c18395d9d5b"}, {"type": "item", "value": {"cardicon": 6, "headline": "Confidentiality & privacy", "description": "We adhere to our privacy and confidentiality policy that guarantees 100% confidentiality"}, "id": "dccbbb04-269b-42fc-88dc-3d36ce62fbf8"}, {"type": "item", "value": {"cardicon": 9, "headline": "High Quality Research", "description": "Our writers conduct extensive research to timely deliver your solution assignment."}, "id": "9e8736b1-e13b-45e1-b2c8-52a90fa347a2"}]}, "id": "bc3e93cf-ab96-4a38-bb01-cf2851368fce"}]
fields.about_bullet: [{"type": "about_bullet", "value": "Buy Essay", "id": "d3ab82ef-45b9-433f-988d-884d6c37b6da"}, {"type": "about_bullet", "value": "Academic Writing", "id": "94a6384a-6c8c-4792-b0ad-04ba40d08cf8"}, {"type": "about_bullet", "value": "Editing Services", "id": "1725c806-60f8-411f-b15f-6372aed9d7bf"}, {"type": "about_bullet", "value": "Dissertation Writing", "id": "e4bde57c-7509-4789-ba91-67fc533a29e9"}, {"type": "about_bullet", "value": "Term Paper Writing", "id": "a267ddca-7209-4ca9-98eb-97b17431cb67"}, {"type": "about_bullet", "value": "Thesis Writing", "id": "73fd981f-25b3-4f95-9a90-917796614aa6"}]
fields.section_about_content:
[{"type": "description", "value": "

The Nursing Ace comprises competent and knowledgeable writers in a wide range of medical writing tasks and research to suit your individual and academic needs.\u00a0 Throughout our coaching experience, you will acquire the confidence, tools, and assistance to enable you to succeed in your respective nursing program.

We empower you to become the leader and nurse you desire. Our medical writing and coaching services are customized to your requirements, with great emphasis on originality, confidentiality, punctuality, and exemplary academic rigor.\u00a0

", "id": "af4d2cc5-3053-43e6-8b4e-0d5b09975684"}]
fields.core_features:
[{"type": "section_core_section", "value": {"eyebrow": "Build for your nursing program", "headline": "Our Core features", "description": "

We believe that no matter how good you are in nursing practice,\u00a0 our assistance in your writing and research tasks will make you even better.

"}, "id": "6ab0267f-26a3-4fc4-9ba6-f15cab1aad3c"}]
fields.core_features_cards: [{"type": "features_cards", "value": {"cards": [{"type": "item", "value": {"fontawesome": "clock-rotate-left", "headline": "24/7 Support", "description": "We are always available for your support. You're guaranteed assistance either by phone, email, or chat."}, "id": "a0470f30-8d4b-40f6-905c-ecbde8c9127c"}, {"type": "item", "value": {"fontawesome": "eye-slash", "headline": "Anonymity", "description": "We care about the privacy of our clients and when you pay for essays, we will never share your personal information with any third parties or even paper writers."}, "id": "7360b303-46f1-4d6b-9b17-cbedd01e1fbe"}, {"type": "item", "value": {"fontawesome": "infinity", "headline": "Unlimited & Free Edits", "description": "When you pay for essay writing, you have 30 days after the order was completed to ask our essay writers for free revisions, in case you need any."}, "id": "2e48a07b-6b28-4bf3-8008-cb80f742ccd1"}]}, "id": "ccedba89-b503-42fb-9551-12606d9fb409"}]
fields.citation_hub: [{"type": "citation_section", "value": {"eyebrow": "Citation Hub", "headline": "Get your paper cited in the citation style of your choice", "description": ""}, "id": "92af91db-2970-46eb-b939-d872bccaa2ac"}]
fields.citation_styles:
[{"type": "citationStyle", "value": {"eyebrow": "Harvard Style", "headline": "Harvard Format Citation Guide", "description": "

This is a complete guide to Harvard in-text and reference list citations. This easy-to-use, comprehensive guide makes citing any source easy. Check out our other citation guides on\u00a0APA\u00a0and\u00a0MLA 8\u00a0referencing.

", "image": 2}, "id": "1792c78c-c2e3-419a-bb98-b716cec32f8d"}, {"type": "citationStyle", "value": {"eyebrow": "MLA Style", "headline": "MLA 8 Citation Guide", "description": "

This is a complete guide to MLA 8 (Modern Language Association, 8th edition) in-text and reference list citations. This easy-to-use, comprehensive guide makes citing any source easy. Check out our other citation guides on\u00a0APA\u00a0and\u00a0Harvard\u00a0referencing.

", "image": 3}, "id": "e6a4b5cc-6823-4a33-bf92-8cad0b631cca"}, {"type": "citationStyle", "value": {"eyebrow": "APA Style", "headline": "APA Format Citation Guide", "description": "

This is a complete guide to APA (American Psychological Association) in-text and reference list citations. This easy-to-use, comprehensive guide makes citing any source easy.\u00a0

", "image": 4}, "id": "04147b97-1323-4615-9fc5-46a2ce31bae4"}]
fields.timely_updates:
[{"type": "timely_updates", "value": {"eyebrow": "Right to your inbox", "headline": "Get timely updates and fresh ideas delivered to your inbox", "description": "

The nursing field is continuously changing. We continuously produce new content based on curriculum updates requirements. Whether you're in school or in practice, you can use our free content to stay updated on the trend.

"}, "id": "f19ad4e4-a162-460a-8735-edeab16c6407"}]
